product_name: Lole Romp Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The versatile Lole Romp women's capris provide a flattering fit with stretchy, quick-drying fabric and kicked-back style that goes easily from the yoga studio or gym class to trail runs or hikes. Recycled Momentum four-way stretch fabric is lightweight and soft, and retains its flattering shape; it dries quickly and resists wrinkles. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Drawcord at waistband and lower cuffs personalize the fit. Hand pockets and a zippered coin-size pocket at hip. Lole Romp capri pants have a casual, relaxed fit with a low rise. Closeout.
short_description: The versatile Lole Romp women's capris provide a flattering fit with stretchy, quick-drying fabric and kicked-back style that goes easily from the yoga studio or gym class to trail runs or hikes.
